description: This is a configuration class for setting up Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) policies in a Spring Boot application. It defines a bean to configure allowed origins, methods, headers, and credentials for cross-origin requests.

classes.name: CorsConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that defines a CorsFilter bean to handle CORS settings globally.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Creates and returns a CorsFilter bean configured with allowed origins, methods, headers, and credentials for CORS requests.
